flawed_nl_solution:
If the solver got a head in 65 of the 211 flips, he got 211-65 =<<211-65=142>>142 tails
The number of tails than he got more than head is 142-65=<<142-65=77>>77

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 146, not 142. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
